text: Yesli shaytan iskushayet tebya, podvergaya tebya navazhdeniyu, chtoby otvesti tebya ot poveleniy Allakha, o ty, k kotoromu My obrashchayemsya, togda prosi u Allakha zashchity ot nego i pribegay k Yego pomoshchi. Poistine, Allakh ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch'. On - Slyshashchiy i Znayushchiy, i On zashchitit tebya ot shaytana
